name: Marbles (taleenders)
description:
Marbles:

Have you lost your marbles, well here is your chance to find them. 

Small 2d platformer done for the global game jam 2021, just for fun and a little bit of adventure. 

Would love to get as much feedback as possible on the parts of the game that were completed. 

It was fun to make and hope it is at least a little fun to play.  

Enjoy.
